TopicTitle: Anyone have any good cinematic mods?

Articles.Content:
Hello all.

I was wondering if anyone had some good KSP filming or Cinematic mods.

Thank you, this will be greatly appreciated!

[URL="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/136086"]Camera Focus Changer[/URL]
[URL="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/94171"]Camera Tools[/URL]
[URL="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/134974"]Greenscreen Mod[/URL]
[URL="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/46365"]Hullcam VDS[/URL]
[URL="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/130663"]Kerbal Animation Suite[/URL]
[URL="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/107397"]Kerbal CCTV[/URL]
[URL="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24757"]KerbCam[/URL]
[URL="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/122297"]WasdEditorCamera: FPS editor controls[/URL]
[URL="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/102988"]MovieTime - Olde Timey Movie and TV Effects[/URL]
[URL="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/130759"]ScreenMessageHider[/URL]

Now what would be fantastic would be something that allows control of camera depth of field. It would be nice to see that as part of camera tools. DoF, programmable camera motion, and multiple cameras. Simulating, rack focus, zollies, and all the various camera movement. I can fake it a bit with the green screen mod and then After Effects, but if there was integration.

Or I could just animate this in Maya/Blender (with what time?).

Just a thought...

CliftonM is also updating EVA followers.. it allows you to put kerbals on a patrol with way points that they walk between, and/or make groups of them follow each other... SO if you want to bring life to your scene, I'd grab it once it's finished. He just started working on it saturday night. Might be a bit.

On 11/26/2015, 2:02:34, hab136 said:

Camera Focus Changer
Camera Tools
Greenscreen Mod
Hullcam VDS
Kerbal Animation Suite
Kerbal CCTV
KerbCam
WasdEditorCamera: FPS editor controls
MovieTime - Olde Timey Movie and TV Effects
ScreenMessageHider

See now this would be perfect for THE MOD DOCKET.  Pinned post in Add-On discussions.
